body.name: ViewSonic VX1655 15.6 Inch 1080p FHD Portable LED IPS Monitor with 2 Way Powered 60W USB C, Mini HDMI, Dual Speakers, and Built-in Stand with Tripod Mount,Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 24 mins
features: ULTRA-PORTABLE MONITOR: 15.6 Inch FHD (1920x1080p) LED portable monitor with 60Hz refresh rate and protective screen cover
SMALL AND COMPACT: With a weight of 1.7 lbs and a thickness of 0.8 in, this portable monitor slips easily into backpacks and purses
LESS CABLE CLUTTER: USB-C connectivity for fast data, audio and video transfer, and 2 way powered 60W USB C charging.
Tripod Mount Ready: Comes with a built-in stand with an integrated tripod mount
INDUSTRY-LEADING WARRANTY: 3-year coverage with access to our US-based customer service team
body.description: The ViewSonic® VX1655 is a 15.6” portable monitor with 1080p resolution for incredible visual performance on the go. An ultra-thin panel with the hardware integrated into the kickstand provides incredible stability, discreetly hides cable connectivity, and still allows for use in portrait and landscape modes. A convenient tripod mount is integrated into the stand for additional versatility. In addition, versatile connectivity options include two USB-C ports for 2-way charging, as well as mini-HDMI and a headphone jack. Measuring less than an inch thick and weighing under two pounds, the ultra-slim VX1655 perfectly fits into any bag, briefcase, or backpack so you can work wherever life takes you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VX1655 Work and Play Anywhere Portability Meets Productivity

Ultra-Portable Design Measuring a mere 0.8” thick and weighing less than 2 pounds, this compact monitor can be easily packed and transported wherever you go. Extended Screen for Mobile Devices With built-in USB-C connectivity, this monitor delivers additional screen space for your Windows, Android, Chrome, MacOS and iOS devices. Stunning HD Resolution Enjoy a premium viewing experience with stunning Full HD resolution – more than 2x more pixels as standard HD resolution. IPS Panel Technology With SuperClear IPS panel technology, this monitor delivers the same image quality whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front or the side.

2-Way Power with 60W USB Type-C Dual USB Type-C ports provide single cable connectivity and two-way power. *A connected laptop can power the monitor, or vice versa via USB-C power bank or AC adapter and outlet. Versatile Connectivity In addition to dual USB-C ports, this monitor also features a mini HDMI port and a 3.5mm headphone jack for plug and-play connectivity Better Gaming On-The-Go Play games in stunning resolution no matter where you are. Simply connect your favorite consoles via USB-C or mini HDMI.

Previous page Portrait Orientation Flicker-Free and Blue Light Filter help to combat eye fatigue over extended periods of viewing. Mountable on Tripods An integrated tripod mount adds greater stability and flexibility for photoshoots, editing and more. Built-In Stand Cable connectors enable users to orient the screen in both portrait and landscape modes. Eye Care Flicker-Free technology & Blue Light Filter help combat eye fatigue over extended periods of viewing Next page 1 Portrait Orientation 2 Mountable on Tripods 3 Built-In Stand 4 Eye Care

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Portable Monitor
reviews.reviewText: This is actually my first time writing a review on Amazon. I was so excited to finally have what I was looking for! So I hope to help out anyone thats struggling. Portable monitors seems to be a growing trend so not much precise information online.It took me some trial and error with different brands, both well known and third party but this one is it. Overall this monitor fits in everything that I was looking for in a portable monitor.Now to begin with my specific use case; I am a professional photographer, and at the moment a Computer Science student. I wanted a portable monitor that fits in all of my bags along with my laptop, allows me to do some photo and video editing (16" MacBook Pro), would connect to my cell phone via USB-C (iPhone 15 Pro), would allow portrait mode for coding projects, and would plug into Nintendo Switch without needing a dock. This is the one that delivered! So thank you so much ViewSonic for delivering!Some caveats to mention, One Cable USB-C works prefect with the MacBook Pro, even in 4K resolution.To use with Nintendo Switch or iPhone, the other USB-C port has to be connected to a power source. Wall outlet or PowerBank. (In my scenario I used and Anker PowerBank and it works!)This is will all portable monitors though, not just this one. So here's why I settled with this one.Pros:+ Super lightweight! This screen is approximately 1.6lbs and will add nothing in weight for carrying.+ Very Portable! 16" is a great size and it does a good job at being close to matching the MacBook Pro.+ 16" OLED 4K screen (Its great to watch movies but don't expect it to replace a 65" 4K OLED TV).+ 170 Degrees Visual from different angles (Consistent image quality from different angles).+ 100% DCI-P3 coverage/most of Adobe RGB (which is great for color accuracy, photo and video editing)+ Built in Portrait mode which is great for coding or editing (might need to level the stand)+ Has a built in speaker (No, they are not strong but at least its provided, better than nothing)+ 3.5mm Jack (plugs into a portable speakers with 3.5mm Jack or headphones)+ Provides Power to devices (iPhone 15/Switch) that are connected via Wall Outlet or PowerBank.Cons:- 60hz only (would have been even better at 120hz to match my Mac, and maybe the Switch 2?)Probably asking for too much but would hav been the icing on the cake.- Expensive ~$500 (but to be honest it's not really a con, you get what you pay for and for it to do everything that I need without extra dongles. I'm perfectly fine with paying the price tag)Overall though I can't complain about this purchase; just being a little nitpicky. If ViewSonic decides to keep producing these and release a version with 120hz, I would buy it in a heartbeat but as of now it's perfect! Check out the attached photos for my use cases.-----|The only other well know brand I tried was the ASUS ZenScreen MB16QHG. Almost kept it too but I did not want to carry around with me additional dongles for my Switch:Pros:+ 2K+ 120hz+ Built in Stand (Portrait mode too)+ 3.5mm Jack+ 100% DCI-P3+ Full HDMI Cable (Not Mini)+ Great Portrait Mode Stand+ Auto-Rotate (Windows Only)+ Very LightweightCons:- It doest NOT connect the Nintendo Switch without a dock, then even with a dock connected the 16:10 aspect ratio doesn't not convert to 16:9 for gaming. It left the gameplay looking distorted and for me personally I wasn't a fan.- No built in speakers- Expensive while lacking features ~$400-----|The only third party brand I tried was the UPERFECT 18" Gaming Monitor (Almost perfect). Would have kept it if I was just for gaming. But it doesn't fit all my bags, and having to constantly recalibrate it would have sucked.Pros:+ 2K+ 144hz+ Connects to Nintendo Switch via USB-C without a dock+ FreeSync+ Both 16:9/16:10+ 100% DCI-P3+ Vesa Mount+ Affordable ~$257Cons:- 18" Screen not very portable.- Passible Portrait mode needs Vesa Mount Stand to be more stable.- Brightness settings reset when disconnected from power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Road Warriors Best Friend
reviews.reviewText: The TD1655 portable monitor is not just a convenience; it's a productivity booster. With its crisp visuals, responsive touch controls, and versatile connectivity options, it's become an essential part of my toolkit. Whether I'm collaborating with colleagues, giving presentations, or working on creative projects, this monitor's flexibility and performance are nothing short of exceptional. It's a portable powerhouse that gets the job done with style, and I can't recommend it enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT Add-On Screens! I Bought Two of the Touchscreen Models
reviews.reviewText: I bought TWO - the first for an Apple MacBook Pro (M1); the second for an ASUS ZenBook Windows 10 computer.1. The Apple connection was easy - NOTE: you should plug the ViewSonic into a power source, then connect the ViewSonic to the MacBook Pro (M1). That way, the ViewSonic provides the sole power (initially to the ViewSonic and then through the USB-C PD cable to the MBP-M1 (make SURE you get a cable rated for 65W or above (I use a 100W cable and things work as expected)). Connecting this way is important as if frees up the second USB-C port on the MBP-1A for anything else you want to connect (I have a USB-C hub and four hard drives connected (this all at the same time as the ViewSonic is connected)).2. The ASUS took a bit more finagling - however, if you set the resolution correctly for the Mouse Screen, you can actually have all three screen available (ViewSonic, ASUS laptop screen and Mouse screen) at the same time. I have all my ViewSonic's positioned "above" my laptop screens.3. It is important to understand the screens are set to 50% on all settings when right out of the box. This initially makes the screen look washed out. HOWEVER - by simply access the built-in ViewSonic adjustment menu (available by pushing the button on the back of the screen), you can increase both the brightness and contrast to mimic your portable screen (if necessary).These two screens are awesome on the road - they are thin but sturdy and pack/travel well, easy to set up, and the touch screen works as advertised with the appropriate drivers downloaded and installed.I've even used them with an iPad Pro - and as with all things connected to an Apple computer - they simply work!Can you tell I really enjoy the versatility these monitor/screen give me?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent thin second monitor for office work
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I am extremely pleased with this monitor. Excellent to toss in with your laptop in your laptop case.Pros:+ Incredibly thin, very compact+ Excellent build quality - metal backing, protective thin shield for screen+ Excellent touchscreen+ Can be powered from a host device USB-C. This works whether the host device is plugged in or operating on battery. When you can plug in the host device, that powers the ViewSonic monitor, as well.+ Lots of adjustments+ Even when brightness is turned down (to save battery on the host device), the screen is very readablee.+ Good resolution for very readable quality.+ Excellent multi angle kickstand is very solid and supports the entire monitor.+ Works well for Samsung DeX. The touchscreen really helps with this type of usa.Cons:- Speakers are thin and tinny.... better than nothing, but you might want to use headphones with the host device.- As others have observed, the colors are a bit on the dull side. There are lots of adjustments available through the monitor menu, so it can be tuned for what you need it for. Generally, this a very good office applications monitor and less of a multimedia monitor. Don't get me wrong, it's not bad at all for Netflix, etc.Overall, I think ViewSonic did a great job with this monitor and I highly recommend it for your road use.
The best way to make sure you don't come home to a bugged monitor.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es de batalla, colores tenues pero muy recomendable!
reviews.reviewText: Es un monitor pequeño y si eso estás buscando, como yo, es perfecto, no estorba, no pesa no causa problemas de acomodo ni de transporte.No funciona con iOS de iphone, con android sí, es algo que ya me esperaba... Al convertirse en táctil al conectarlo a una pc debes instalar ciertos drivers y conectar otro cable, digo esto porque yo me asusté pensando que compré la versión no touch y resulta que solo era necesario eso. Al conectar esos cables extra se convierte ahora sí en algo más estorboso pero tampoco nada exagerado. Tiene un stylus o lapiz bastante rústico que bien podría mejorarse pero como yo no planeaba dibujar ni nada que demandase algo más allá de navegar por el sistema operativo me resulta suficiente.Al conectar este monitor como monitor secundario en una pc, el touch no sirve, necesita ser el monitor principal y eso a veces causa pequeños problemitas, aunque nada de real cuidado.Tiene una patita trasera que sirve bastante bien, permite varias posiciones de acomodo, no parece ser muy resistente y a veces me da la impresión que no durará mucho, los ángulos que se logra con dicha patita no son tampoco muy variados pero son suficientes para lo que se requiera.Los colores del monitor, creo que es su lado más débil... son colores muy opacos, saturando todo y moviéndole mucho a los parámetros se logra algo decente, pero si es un punto malo, si lo buscas para algo de edición no creo que sea lo mejor.El menú o sistema operativo interno del monitor es bastante común, se maneja bien, solo hay que agarrarle el modo.Es un buen monitor secundario, es muy portátil, es una excelente compra, lo recomiendo bastante!

This is not the cheapest portable touchscreen monitor but it's worth it. Good quality, smart design with the flip-out support like the Microsoft Surface Pro, easy to connect and works right out of the box. All necessary cables included and a USB-C charger. The charger is not required when connecting the screen via USB to the computer. Menu joystick on the back is not ideal but it works.
Ótima compra, mudou a qualidade com que entrego meu trabalho no dia a dia.Com um monitor portátil, agora posso levar meu setup para qualquer lugar.Imagem ótima,

reviews.reviewTitle: Dice tactil pero muy dificil hacer la instalacion
reviews.reviewText: No llegue a hacer que la parte tactil funcione. Por eso lo quise devolver pero ya no me dejan - habian puesto 3 fechas distintas para devolverlo.
